column1: is a semi-annual international scholarly periodical published by the <i><font color="#FF0000"><a href="society.htm">Sidney
Society. The journal is designed to provide a critical forum
for scholars and students of Sir Philip Sidney, Mary Sidney Herbert, and other members of the Sidney family and circle.
invite articles of any length. The journal also welcomes submissions of
advance notices of conferences, calls for papers, and other events
of interest to Sidneians. All submitted articles are refereed by
by prepaid subscription to forthcoming volumes of two issues each.
Subscribers are advised of subscription expirations by invoices enclosed
with the final issue for which subscriptions have been paid.&nbsp
